IR keytable for Kathrein RC 660 remote control
IRMP_IR60_PROTOCOL
Uses 30kHz and doesn't work with 38kHz receivers!

0x24,0x2290,0x000d,0x00   Mute
0x24,0x2290,0x000c,0x00   Power
0x24,0x2290,0x0001,0x00   1
0x24,0x2290,0x0002,0x00   2
0x24,0x2290,0x0003,0x00   3
0x24,0x2290,0x0004,0x00   4
0x24,0x2290,0x0005,0x00   5
0x24,0x2290,0x0006,0x00   6
0x24,0x2290,0x0007,0x00   7
0x24,0x2290,0x0008,0x00   8
0x24,0x2290,0x0009,0x00   9
0x24,0x2290,0x0000,0x00   0
0x24,0x2290,0x0054,0x00   Menu
0x24,0x2290,0x003c,0x00   Text
0x24,0x2290,0x006d,0x00   Red
0x24,0x2290,0x006e,0x00   Green
0x24,0x2290,0x006f,0x00   Yellow
0x24,0x2290,0x0070,0x00   Blue
0x24,0x2290,0x0010,0x00   Vol+
0x24,0x2290,0x0011,0x00   Vol-
0x24,0x2290,0x001e,0x00   Prog+
0x24,0x2290,0x001f,0x00   Prog-
0x24,0x2290,0x000f,0x00   Info
0x24,0x2290,0x0058,0x00   Up
0x24,0x2290,0x0059,0x00   Down
0x24,0x2290,0x005a,0x00   Left
0x24,0x2290,0x005b,0x00   Right
0x24,0x2290,0x005c,0x00   OK
0x24,0x2290,0x0055,0x00   Exit
0x24,0x2290,0x00cc,0x00   EPG
0x24,0x2290,0x0021,0x00   RWND
0x24,0x2290,0x0020,0x00   FFWD
0x24,0x2290,0x0038,0x00   Play
0x24,0x2290,0x0039,0x00   Pause
0x24,0x2290,0x0031,0x00   Stop
0x24,0x2290,0x0037,0x00   Record
